Package possportstore

Class CurrentSale

java.lang.Object
possportstore.CurrentSale
public class CurrentSale extends Object
Manages the current transaction, including the shopping cart, discounts, and total calculation.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    CurrentSale.CartItem
    Represents an item line in the shopping cart (Product + Quantity + Discount).

  • Constructor Summary

    CurrentSale(User authenticatedUser)
    Initializes a new sale session for a specific user.

  • Method Details

    • getAuthenticatedUser

      public User getAuthenticatedUser()
      Gets the user performing the sale.

    • getCurrentTotal

      public double getCurrentTotal()
      Gets the current total after ALL discounts (Item + Global).

    • getGlobalDiscountPercent

      public double getGlobalDiscountPercent()
      Gets the global discount percentage.

    • setGlobalDiscountPercent

      public void setGlobalDiscountPercent(double globalDiscountPercent)
      Sets the global discount percentage (0.0 to 1.0).

    • getItems

      public CurrentSale.CartItem[] getItems()
      Retrieves the list of items currently in the cart.
      Returns:
      An array of CurrentSale.CartItem.

    • addItem

      public void addItem(Product product, int quantity)
      Adds a product to the cart. If the product exists, updates the quantity.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to add.
      quantity - The quantity to add.

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(Product product)
      Removes one unit of a product from the cart. If quantity reaches zero, the item line is removed entirely.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to remove.

    • setItemDiscount

      public void setItemDiscount(int index, double percent)
      Applies a discount to a specific item in the cart.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the item.
      percent - The discount percentage (0.0 - 1.0).

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears all items and resets discounts.
